description: Concatenates five attributes to create CAS_ID

validation_rules: hasCountOfNotNull({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1, species_5_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2}, 1, 'FALSE'|NOT_APPLICABLE)
description: Validation catches rows with no forest info and returns NOT_APPLICABLE. Translation runs countOfNotNull for the two forest layers. If one layer, returns SINGLE_LAYERED, if two layers returns MULTI_LAYERED.

validation_rules: sk_utm_hasCountOfNotNull({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1, species_5_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2}, {np}, 1, FALSE|-8886)
translation_rules: sk_utm_countOfNotNull({species_1_layer1, species_2_layer1, species_3_layer1, species_4_layer1, species_5_layer1}, {species_1_layer2, species_2_layer2}, {np}, 3)
description: Count layers up to max of 3. Layers are the canopy species, understory species, and non-forest types. Zero counted as null for non-forest codes. Validation returns UNKNOWN if num_of_layers is zero.
Converts source area from m2 to ha
